::Shredder/Grimmler::

Shredder nearly yelps in pain as he is pummeled by shots, his right leg 
falling to the ground. His left leg goes limp as the moving mechanism is 
destroyed, the rest of his body being pummeled by shots.

"Lets get out of here!" he yells to the other Destrons (the old ones, not the 
new ones), "They can have this wrecked base!"

He takes out a photon grenade, throwing it down at the new bots, turning to 
fly off away from the base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler almost spits at the suggestion of the Preds helping. "Allying with 
the Preds will be a big mistake, but I'm not gonna make the decision. THat's 
up to Kluster and Iron Raptor."

He was still used to being under Kluster's command, so he thought that 
Kluster should have a say in the decsion. "Let's get back to the Ark, we can 
see then."
